title: Cille Cyklus
subtitle: Interactive storytelling about the menstrual cycle
description: Digital storytelling finals exam project about the menstrual cycle, focusing on emotions, breaking taboos and providing information about menstruation through interactive storytelling. credits: Digital storytelling, interaction design, illustration, animation, javascript
